long_desc.thetext:
IS: qx.ui.mobile.page.Manager do have a addDetail and addMaster method. Depending on which method is used, the NavigationPage is added to the Master or Detail container.
SHOULD:
qx.ui.mobile.page.Manager should have a "add()" method. This method fits to the API of qx.Mobile widgets, which also have a add method. The decision whether the NavigationPage is a master or detail page is made by a flag the NavigationPage should have: "isMaster()" The addDetail and addMaster methods stay in API, as they useful anyway.

After a discussion with team, the "add()"-Method is not necessary for page manager, because the threads the given pages in a different way than the "add()"-method does. Add methods simply adds a widget to another, the "addDetail" and "addMaster" methods do much more than this, as they decide how to handle the pages.
That is why, this bug will be resolved as "WONTFIX".
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
